website_summaries.verdict: An excellent and nutrient-packed choice for medium sized and smaller breeds having digestive difficulties.
pros: Rice and oatmeal ingredients are easy to digest
Little kibble bites are easy for smaller breeds to eat
Rich in antioxidants for a strong immune system
cons: Kibbles can be large for small dogs to eat

customer_reviews.title: Price went up $11.00/bag in only one month... WTH?!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this dog food last month for $33.99 per 37.5lb bag. This month, the price has gone up to $44.99 per 37.5lb bag. I love the food, but I'm pretty pissed at the $11.00/bag price increase in the span of one month. Extremely disappointed with that. Otherwise the food itself is still great.
customer_reviews.author: chris delesio

customer_reviews.title: ... four dogs and four different sizes and this is perfect and vets my veterinarian recommended Purina Pro Plan so ...
customer_reviews.text: We have four dogs and four different sizes and this is perfect and vets my veterinarian recommended Purina Pro Plan so we're very happy with this and the dogs love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our dog sure likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is almost 1 year old, and this was our first try at "adult" dog foods. We were told to combine the two (puppy and adult) to ease her transition. Well, she ate everything! On her second bowl, she left about 1/3 of her dinner - it looked like all puppy chow! Smart dog. We're sold!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this kibble!
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the Small Bite Lamb and Rice formula. Finally, a dog food that all my dogs can and will eat. I have 4 dogs of varying sizes, small to large, and the small size of the kibble means that I don't have to have separate foods for them. In addition, my large dog has always been a picky eater but he loves this food, cleaning his bowl quickly instead of leaving the food sitting. His excessive flatulence has also been helped by this food, as has his itchiness. Over the years I have fed my dogs the high priced "premium" foods but I will be sticking with this Purina formula from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lynn Umpleby

customer_reviews.title: Product was not the problem
customer_reviews.text: When you use two boxes - one for cat food, and one for dog food, that is fine. One box normal size for the bag of animal food - the other box large enough to hold 4 or 6 bags of food! What a waste of a large box! It was hard to carry as I have to use a walker.
customer_reviews.author: Dorie M

customer_reviews.title: New formula of this food (August 2020) made my dog very sick
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with the new "formula" of this pro plan lamb and rice small bites. - old formula has a spaniel on the front, the new formula has a husky. I had fed this kibble successfully for over a year and one feeding of the new formula made my dog vomit. I backed off and tried to feed it slowly and same result. I will now be looking for a new kibble for my dog from a different brand. VERY DISSAPOINTED since it is difficult to find a no chicken products non grain free food!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Best price per lb if you have prime
customer_reviews.text: Best price per lb out there if you have prime. My dog still wont eat this plain I have to add topper to her food to get her to eat it. Ive tried many types of food. She start this up when I switched her from puppy to adult food. This brand is the brand that she will eat the most of.
customer_reviews.author: Nature Lover

customer_reviews.title: Possible Food Contamination
customer_reviews.text: Purchase on March 6. We switched from Purina Puppy Mix to small bites. Our dog initially liked it and didn't mind the switch. When went to refill our air tight food container storage container, I noticed little white spec through the remaining kibble. Called Purina, they pretty much said to throw it out. I have a picture of it if I can figure how I can attach it to the review.
customer_reviews.author: kevngh

customer_reviews.title: Great food for our Cavaliers!
customer_reviews.text: We tried many many different dog foods for our 2 cavaliers. Each met with mixed reviews for nothing has hit the mark like the Purina. Both dogs jump for joy at meal time and finished their food in a blink of an eye! It was a recommendation from our Vet and has proved to be a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: We have a Labrador who loves this food. She has been on it for nearly two years---most of her life. Her coat is shiny and healthy. She is energetic. We are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great food!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best dog food!!! We've used this brand since our dogs were puppies and don't have any complaints. You'll notice difference in your dogs coat, health, weight, and energy levels. Overall I have no doubt that Purina Pro Plan has made my dogs "happy"!
customer_reviews.author: Amira

customer_reviews.title: Make your photo match the description!
customer_reviews.text: Your suggested “remedy” is non-sensical. WHY would I want to replace what is clearly the WRONG item with another of the same thing? Why would anyone? You should offer to replace it with the CORRECT item, or else you would simply repeat/compound the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Myer

customer_reviews.title: Very Tech Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This review asked about the flavor. I asked the terrier and a husky, and didn’t get a response. The good thing iszzis that they eat it!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: Dogs seem to love the flavor. Ingredients are good but found one better for our dogs for the money at Atwood's
customer_reviews.author: Shea Reust

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: Great food, check the ingredients list, used this to mix with my more expensive dog food so it would last longer and my dogs are please and have a healthy shiny coat. Feeding this to my 3 month old puppy and my 3 year old pittie they both love it
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: My dogs favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Healthy food choice for my dogs. Cheaper than Petsmart. Having it delivered to my door saves me time and energy.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B

customer_reviews.title: food
customer_reviews.text: can't attest to the flavor but the dogs seem to like it
customer_reviews.author: jeanne murray

customer_reviews.title: Who knew so many dogs were allergic to poultry?
customer_reviews.text: Who knew poultry was in so many of the "top" dog foods? My girl loves this stuff, it keeps her coat soft and shiny, and best of all: no allergies. Purina Pro Plan doesn't mess around like some brands. If they say it's Lamb and Rice, you are not going to find any ingredients on there that list a poultry product. No chicken to mess with your Foofoo or Fluffy. This is reasonably priced, and has enough of the good, healthy stuff in it to make me feel that I'm doing the best for my little mutt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Livelier dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. We had used the savor flavor before but they like this more. It has also helped my older dogs liven up a bit
customer_reviews.author: Ginni N. Sperry

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great inexpensive dog food. Both of our large breed dogs have issues with food. One of our dogs has allergies (undetermined) and the other has irritable bowel syndrome. We have tried all different brands including brands that are double the price of this one. This is the only brand that has relieved all of their issues. I was pleasantly surprised. They love that the pieces are small as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren V.

customer_reviews.title: He is very picky and I’m glad that this pro plan is available
customer_reviews.text: Have a 10 year old who absolutely loves this food. He is very picky and I’m glad that this pro plan is available. We had to buy this on a pinch as we were out of town and Amazon did an awesome job getting it to our dog sitter!
customer_reviews.author: Jubla

customer_reviews.title: Happiness
customer_reviews.text: Good solid product. You can’t go wrong with Purina. I did wonder from PR hype of other brands but have returned. As a Tzu show/breeder it’s a must in trust of what you feed.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Flanigan

customer_reviews.title: Small Bites for small dog
customer_reviews.text: So far my dog likes it. She like small bites and this works well for her.
customer_reviews.author: rockytop

customer_reviews.title: Pro Plan is a true quality product
customer_reviews.text: I started using Pro Plan when our cat got sick. The Vet was no help. We tried other expensive cat foods. No change. Changed his diet to Pro Plan and all of his problems (real loose stools) disappeared. Which told me that Pro Plan is a true quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: The kibbles are the same size as the regular formula ...
customer_reviews.text: The kibbles are the same size as the regular formula I buy for my other dogs? Bought a small bag so just mixed with my regular dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Roxelle P.

customer_reviews.title: Must be delicious
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes it so much she seems afraid my family going to steal it from her bowl...at least that's one theory why she is skittish at meal time
customer_reviews.author: justmeboss

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like it, even my 8 yr old Irish Water Spaniel, who's a bit particular about what he'll eat
customer_reviews.author: Dushkes

customer_reviews.title: A lot easier than going to the store
customer_reviews.text: No more worries about dragging the dogfood out of the store and the car
customer_reviews.author: Caravanpark3

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my dogs' favorite dry food! They like it better than several other brands I've tried, including Evolve, Hill's and Iams. I love that it comes in a large bag that will feed my 4 dogs all month.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M Endres

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Frenchie grew up on the puppy version, and continues to gobble it up as a youngster.
customer_reviews.author: Nola Nole

customer_reviews.title: Sassy loves it
customer_reviews.text: My collie eats this easily and likes it. Well worth the value!
customer_reviews.author: Minamarie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! Healthy Food!  Subscribe & Save
customer_reviews.text: My lab loves it transitioned well idk why there are so many bad reviews about the food I subscribe for a bag every other month no issues! Thanks! @calithedog
customer_reviews.author: XDWayne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The dogs are loving it and the senior dog seems to be more active!
customer_reviews.author: Lori K

customer_reviews.title: my dogs did not eat it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs smelled it and left the food, it seemed that it was old or had something strange because they preferred to stay two days without trying and meals were changed twice a day and nothing. I had to discard it because I did not dare to give it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: zully

customer_reviews.title: food
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't like this food since we started getting it from amazon think it's bad or expired. I have my son's dog and he ate it and has been very sick now had to take him to vet . I really don't know what the problem is but something is.
customer_reviews.author: sandy hill

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it, we love the lack of mess
customer_reviews.text: We used purina lamb and rice dog food for years then purina changed the formula to the SMART blend. Really bad idea for our dogs. They love the soft kibble a in the smart blend so dig in the food for the SMART part & make a giant mess around their food bowl. This is the original recipe Purina lamb and rice that we have been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Chris in Sitka

customer_reviews.title: All 8 of my Dogs Approve!
customer_reviews.text: All 8 of my dogs enjoyed this food. From the smallest to the largest. It is hard to find a dog food that all will eat.
customer_reviews.author: Shari M. Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Box food was shipped in was full of ants
customer_reviews.text: The box the dog food was shipped in was full of ants. The bag of dog food is outside now and we’re reluctant to open it
customer_reviews.author: jmk

customer_reviews.title: Small dog doesn't like size of kibble
customer_reviews.text: My Chinese Crested won't eat this. I gave the bag away. The wolf like shepherd I gave it too says "Its OK every other day, but I don't want it daily." I don't know what has happened to dog food in the last decade, but I am not having much luck in finding one my dog actually likes.
customer_reviews.author: Viola

customer_reviews.title: I have to admit
customer_reviews.text: I support local businesses, however, I have to admit, getting this delivered rather than carrying it to the car and in to the house is pretty nice.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: I don't love it, my dogs do. It's probably a bit more like feeding them McDonald's then something truly healthy, but I supplement their diet with fish and other game, so it works for me. The price was excellent when I bought it, but I think it was on sale. The shipping was quick and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya L.

customer_reviews.title: no shredded dried meat in it but dogs eat it slower.
customer_reviews.text: my dogs eat this quite well. they are used t purina one with the shredded dry meats, and the pro plan with the shredded dry meat. since my dogs are active 50% of the time and 50% lazy I see no change except they are more attentive when they hear their name,
customer_reviews.author: I. Bratt

customer_reviews.title: smart, and never sick
customer_reviews.text: I have raised two dogs almost exclusively on Purina Pro Plan. They both never seem to get tired of it. They are active, at a healthy weight, smart, and never sick. The focus, sport, and savor lines are all great fuel for healthy dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn Morris

customer_reviews.title: My four dogs love it and they have less waste
customer_reviews.text: My four dogs love it and they have less waste. One of my dogs had skin irritation issues prior to using this product, but we are on the second bag and she seems to be much better.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Crow

customer_reviews.title: I don't love it but my english springer spaniel does
customer_reviews.text: I don't love it but my english springer spaniel does. He is allergic to poultry, pork and fish poor fella but he didn't waste any time digging in so he doesn't care!

customer_reviews.title: This is the first time I had issues

customer_reviews.text: My Vet recommended this for my dog Lucky. Great dog food. Lamb & rice. No corn. Much better for her!

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as an off-season alternative to the 30/20 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an off-season alternative to the 30/20 Performance Sport, which I use during hunting season for my English Springer Spaniel. This food is ok but I will probably shift to the new 26/14 Active next time.

customer_reviews.text: Love this dog food for my dog with a sensitive stomach. Love that it was able to be delivered to my door.

customer_reviews.title: Practical solution
customer_reviews.text: Really nice to scoop everybody's food out of the same bag instead of having to go to different bags. I wouldn't give this to a dog under 18 months, but mine are way past that.
customer_reviews.author: MJH

customer_reviews.title: They really like it. My only wish is that it had ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my regular brand for my dogs. They really like it. My only wish is that it had a zip-top to keep it fresh. Otherwise, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Kaestner

customer_reviews.title: Love and Trust Purina
customer_reviews.text: Love this food. Dogs always healthy and good coats. Clear eyes, no dandruff, lots of energy. Way better than the lusty designer grain-free brands. Love and trust Purina.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged

customer_reviews.title: Check Expiration Date!
customer_reviews.text: This food was moldy so my dog wouldn't eat it. We didn't see it until he was 1/2 done with the bag. Threw out the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Martin

customer_reviews.title: No leftovers here!
customer_reviews.text: My dog really likes this stuff. I switched from another "higher end" brand that she would never finish. This lamb and rice she eats right up. I add a couple pumps of salmon oil before I fill her dish.
customer_reviews.author: BETMakaveli

customer_reviews.title: Good food for my two small dogs
customer_reviews.text: My little dogs have grown up on this brand. It has the protein they need as 1st ingredient. I do not have any stomach problems such as vomiting or diahrea which to me is a blessing. I would never switch.

customer_reviews.title: and they seem to love it. Not often I find a dry food ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my adult chihuahuas, and they seem to love it. Not often I find a dry food that they readily eat.

Also, we have a springer spaniel so my toddler is very excited that "her dog" is featured on the bag. She says the dog's name every time she sees the dog. Cons: This bag is very heavy and very deep, so I portion it out into a smaller container for feeding

product_meta.title: Purina Pro Plan Small Bites Lamb & Rice Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description: Style:Small Bites| Flavor Name:Lamb & Rice - Small Bites| Size:37.5 lb. BagGive your dog specialized nutrition at every age with Purina Pro Plan FOCUS Small Bites Lamb & Rice Formula All Life Stages dry dog food. Each serving contains high-quality protein, including lamb as the #1 ingredient, and the antioxidant-rich formula helps to support your dog's healthy immune system. The nutrient-dense bite-sized kibble is designed for dogs who prefer eating smaller pieces, and rice and oatmeal offer easily digestible sources of energy. Real meat helps provide the essential building blocks for the protein needs within your dog's body. Formulated to provide specialized nutrition for an exceptional life, this Purina Pro Plan FOCUS super-premium dry dog food follows your canine companion from his playful puppy years through adulthood. For a tasty experience that always delivers, order Purina Pro Plan FOCUS Small Bites Lamb & Rice Formula All Life Stages dry dog food, and give your best buddy the nutrition he needs that is backed by a pet food brand you can trust.
feature_bullets: One (1) 37.5 lb. Bag - Purina Pro Plan High Protein, High Energy Dry Dog Food, Small Bites Lamb & Rice Formula
